channel.title: How To Add a Gamble chest?
channel.description:
ok i got a chest. and when i click on it nothing happens
what should i add to make it work. Just put #### for item ids add about 100 of them

item.title: How To Add a Gamble chest?

item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

you need to randomise the ID’s

item.title: How To Add a Gamble chest?
item.dc:creator: @aaronvdw aaronvdw
item.description:
@aaronvdw wrote:

haha this so easy…For a beginner even.

Go to client.java and search for

if(objectID

You should see some codes with like this

if(objectID = ####){ addItem(####, $$); and more here ..... {
Stay there.

Go to Item.Java
now search for

randombarrows

You should find a code with Randombarrows 2 times in it. and a list of items going to right side.

copy that code and change the name
randombarrows
to
randomlottery and make the objectID your object id
make all items what you want and paste it under RandomBarrows.

Go back to client.java and search first for

randombarrows

Find the code , copy it and change it to RandomLottery and make the objectID your object id. Paste it under.

This works for me in my source , but this is pretty basic way to do it

Read full topic
item.source: How To Add a Gamble chest?
